name: Add new FogBugz users to a Google Sheets spreadsheet as a new rows
description: Every time a new user is created in FogBugz, Make will automatically add that user to a new row in your Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1N-tCFaFPVNwjYY9b7H42_o9NdGQqwo5WAT5TmzyOxUo/edit?usp=sharing).
